pages.name: Gorgon
pages.text: $(thing)Gorgons$()$(#734608) are hideous lamiae, half-woman and half-snake hybrid, with pale green snakes for hair

$(#734608)Gorgons are found living in crumbling stone gorgon temples that may be half-submerged near the beach.$(br2)Locking sights with a gorgon directly will immediately turn the person into stone without warning.$(br2)There is nothing that can escape the petrifying gaze of a gorgon aside from death worms, cockatrices, and blinded cyclopes.
$(#734608)One can wear a blindfold however to protect themselves from becoming petrified, though it will enrage the gorgon into using its incredibly poisonous fangs to attack.
$(#734608)A gorgon will drop its head when slain, which retains a single-use of the gorgon's petrification gaze.$(br2)Petrified mobs can be broken down into stone with a pickaxe.
